snippet: The New York Times Magazine has created a virtual reality film about children uprooted by war, one of many virtual reality videos The Times plans to present to subscribers.
abstract: New York Times announces collaboration with Google on virtual reality project; will distribute more than million cardboard VR viewers to subscribers to watch virtual reality film called The Displaced.
lead_paragraph: The New York Times Magazine has created a virtual reality film about children uprooted by war, one of many virtual reality videos The Times plans to present to subscribers.

headline.print_headline: The Times Joins Google on a Virtual Reality Project
headline.main: The Times Partners With Google on Virtual Reality Project
